sqlMap.select:
select totalpay_id, curr_date, outfee, source_amount, discount_amount, result_amount, recieve_amount, ratio, status, entity_id, is_valid, create_time, op_time, last_ver, op_user_id, discount_plan_id, operator, operate_date, card_id, card, card_entity_id, is_full_ratio, is_minconsume_ratio, is_servicefee_ratio, invoice_code, invoice_memo, invoice, over_status, is_hide, load_time, modify_time, printnum1, printnum2, coupon_discount, discount_amount_receivables, result_amount_receivables, ext from totalpayinfo
order by $orderByClause$

select aa.totalpay_id AS totalpay_idcurr_date, outfee, source_amount, discount_amount, result_amount, recieve_amount, ratio, status, entity_id, is_valid, create_time, op_time, last_ver, op_user_id, discount_plan_id, operator, operate_date, card_id, card, card_entity_id, is_full_ratio, is_minconsume_ratio, is_servicefee_ratio, invoice_code, invoice_memo, invoice, over_status, is_hide, load_time, modify_time, printnum1, printnum2, coupon_discount, discount_amount_receivables, result_amount_receivables from ( select totalpay_id from totalpayinfo
order by $orderByClause$
$paginationScript$
) bb inner join totalpayinfo aa on aa.totalpay_id=bb.totalpay_id

select aa.totalpay_id AS totalpay_id $cols[].name$ from ( select totalpay_id from totalpayinfo
order by $orderByClause$
$paginationScript$
) bb inner join totalpayinfo aa on aa.totalpay_id=bb.totalpay_id

select totalpay_id, curr_date, outfee, source_amount, discount_amount, result_amount, recieve_amount, ratio, status, entity_id, is_valid, create_time, op_time, last_ver, op_user_id, discount_plan_id, operator, operate_date, card_id, card, card_entity_id, is_full_ratio, is_minconsume_ratio, is_servicefee_ratio, invoice_code, invoice_memo, invoice, over_status, is_hide, load_time, modify_time, printnum1, printnum2, coupon_discount, discount_amount_receivables, result_amount_receivables, ext from totalpayinfo where totalpay_id = #totalpayId:VARCHAR#
